showScoreExcerpt:
"'The Audience' is much improved from its London run, a little lighter and bouncier than it had been...Mirren is mesmerizing as she plays Queen Elizabeth...Daldry and Mirren know each other so well that by now this is indeed their magic act...What Daldry and Mirren have done is make QEII–who used to seem aloof and out of touch, enemy of Diana–sympathetic."
